name: Lemon Dill Hummus
description: This Lemon Dill Hummus is great for dipping or spreading, and tastes so bright and fresh. Perfect for warm weather!
recipeIngredient: (1) 15-ounce can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained and rinsed
2-3 tablespoons water, more if needed to reach desired consistency

recipeInstructions.text: Add the first 6 ingredients to a food processor, and blend until smooth. Add in the water, until the desired creamy consistency is reached.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the first 6 ingredients to a food processor, and blend until smooth. Add in the water, until the desired creamy consistency is reached.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with fresh dill if desired, and serve with pita chips, pita bread or various cut vegetables.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with fresh dill if desired, and serve with pita chips, pita bread or various cut vegetables.
